resources.string: There is a problem with your audio recording device
You do not have sufficient permissions. Make sure RECORD_AUDIO permission is granted
A network error has occurred. If you are using Marshmallow and above you can temporarily set offlinemode true
SpeechRecognition could not find a match. Make sure the right language is set
SpeechRecognition is busy at the moment. Try using multiple instances to listen
SpeechRecognition server error. Try again in few minutes
